title: MORSHID frontend QA polish: unify greens, standardize buttons/cards, verify sticky header/WhatsApp, links, images, and YouTube embeds

requirements.summary: Unify every green UI color site-wide to exactly hex #25D366 (including tokens, hover/focus, borders, icons) without changing any non-green colors.
acceptanceCriteria: No UI element uses any green color other than #25D366 (verified by inspecting computed styles for representative elements across Home, For Farmers, and Contact).
Existing non-green colors (e.g., grays, whites, blacks, and any non-green accent colors) are not changed as part of this task.

file_operations.description: Replace any green-tinted theme variables with literal #25D366 (e.g., brand tokens and any other green OKLCH-based tokens used for primary/ring/charts/sidebar) so all green-derived Tailwind colors resolve to exactly #25D366; ensure no non-green tokens are changed.

Audit and adjust any Tailwind color mappings that could emit non-#25D366 greens via theme variables (including ring/primary/morshid-* color entries) so anything that renders green resolves to #25D366; preserve all non-green color mappings.
Replace any remaining inline green values that are not exactly #25D366 (e.g., green section backgrounds or dark-green CTA background) with #25D366; ensure non-green inline colors remain unchanged.
Replace any non-#25D366 green styling (including hover/background shades like #1fb855 or any green-tinted derived backgrounds) with #25D366 while leaving non-green accent colors unchanged.

Ensure any header text/icon/border/hover color that renders green (e.g., brand text token usage) resolves to exactly #25D366 via the updated theme tokens, without changing header content or nav structure.
Verify the floating WhatsApp button’s background/hover/active/focus styles render green as exactly #25D366 (via tokens or explicit values) and remove any non-#25D366 green shades if present.

requirements.summary: Standardize site-wide button styling (rounded corners + consistent padding/height) without editing anything under frontend/src/components/ui.
acceptanceCriteria: All buttons across Home, For Farmers, and Contact have the same corner radius and consistent padding/height when rendered at the same size variant.
No changes are made to any files under frontend/src/components/ui; consistency is achieved via composition/wrappers and/or consistent usage classes.

file_operations.description: Create a thin wrapper around the shadcn-ui Button to enforce a single site-wide baseline (consistent border radius + consistent height/padding per size) while preserving existing variants via props. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Replace direct shadcn-ui Button usage with MorshidButton for all CTAs, removing ad-hoc padding/height/radius overrides so all buttons render consistently; keep all text, destinations, and layout structure unchanged. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Replace direct shadcn-ui Button usage with MorshidButton and normalize classes/styles so all buttons share the same radius and consistent padding/height; preserve existing copy, destinations, and non-button layout. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Replace direct shadcn-ui Button usage with MorshidButton for WhatsApp/Email CTAs and remove per-button styling inconsistencies (while preserving non-green colors like blue). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Standardize site-wide card styling (consistent border + visible shadow) without editing anything under frontend/src/components/ui.
acceptanceCriteria: All Card instances across the site show a visible shadow and consistent border styling.
Card styling is consistent between Home, For Farmers, and Contact (e.g., same border thickness and baseline shadow), while preserving existing layout and content.

file_operations.description: Create wrapper components around shadcn-ui Card (and commonly used subcomponents as needed) to enforce consistent border width/color and baseline shadow intensity across the site while allowing per-card accents (e.g., top border color). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update all Card usages to MorshidCard (and wrappers where applicable) to ensure consistent border/shadow styling while preserving existing spacing, grid layout, and content. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update service cards and FAQ accordion item card-like containers to use consistent card border/shadow baseline (via MorshidCard or shared classes) without changing content/layout. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update contact cards to use the standardized card border/shadow styling so all three cards match the site baseline while keeping existing content and non-card styling intact. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Ensure the header remains sticky on every route while scrolling, including correct stacking context, without changing header content/navigation structure.
acceptanceCriteria: On Home (/), For Farmers (/for-farmers), and Contact (/contact), the header stays fixed at the top while scrolling.
Header does not get covered by page content (correct stacking context).

file_operations.description: Confirm sticky positioning works across routes and adjust only positioning/stacking classes if needed (e.g., ensure sticky/top-0 and a sufficiently high z-index), without changing header text or navigation structure.

Verify layout containers do not disable sticky behavior (e.g., avoid problematic overflow on parent containers) and ensure the main content doesn’t overlap the header during scroll; keep layout structure the same.

requirements.summary: Verify the floating WhatsApp button renders on all pages and remains fixed while scrolling; fix any layout/stacking issues without changing behavior or link.
acceptanceCriteria: Floating WhatsApp button renders on Home, For Farmers, and Contact and remains visible while scrolling.
The button link remains exactly https://wa.me/212623237732 and opens in a new tab.

file_operations.description: Confirm WhatsAppFloatingButton is mounted within the shared layout for all routes and adjust placement only if needed to prevent any route-specific rendering issues; preserve existing structure.
Ensure the floating button remains fixed during scrolling and above all content (z-index/stacking), while keeping href exactly https://wa.me/212623237732 and target=_blank behavior unchanged.

requirements.summary: Replace low-quality hero images with high-quality photo-realistic Moroccan farmer imagery while keeping the same referenced file paths.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero background images on Home and For Farmers are visually high-resolution (no visible pixelation/compression artifacts at common desktop widths) and clearly show Moroccan farmers in a realistic agricultural context.
Existing image URLs referenced by the pages continue to resolve (no broken images).

file_operations.description: Replace the image file contents with a high-quality photo-realistic image clearly depicting Moroccan farmers, keeping the exact same filename and path so existing references continue to work.
Replace the image file contents with a high-quality photo-realistic image clearly depicting Moroccan farmers, keeping the exact same filename and path so existing references continue to work.

requirements.summary: Validate and fix all links across the site so they route/open correctly without changing displayed text.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation links route correctly between /, /for-farmers, and /contact.
All WhatsApp CTAs link to https://wa.me/212623237732.
Email CTA uses mailto:hello@tmu.ai and works.
App CTA links to http://app.morshid.ai and opens successfully.
No anchor element has an invalid href (e.g., empty, '#', or malformed URL) unless required for current behavior.

file_operations.description: Verify header navigation links route correctly to /, /for-farmers, and /contact and fix only incorrect paths if any; do not change visible labels or nav structure.
Verify the footer attribution link is valid, uses a correct absolute URL, and opens in a new tab; fix only href/attributes if broken without changing displayed text.

Audit all Home CTAs (WhatsApp and app link) to ensure href values match the required destinations and open behavior (new tab where applicable); fix only broken/incorrect hrefs without changing displayed text.
Audit all For Farmers WhatsApp CTAs to ensure they all link to https://wa.me/212623237732 with new-tab behavior; fix any incorrect/malformed hrefs without changing displayed text.
Verify WhatsApp, mailto:hello@tmu.ai, and any other anchors are correct and non-empty; fix only href/target/rel issues without changing displayed text.

requirements.summary: Ensure the two Home page YouTube embeds display and play correctly with responsive sizing, preserving the same video IDs.
acceptanceCriteria: Both iframes render and play: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=19kU6cAwXXk and https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DnTsf91_UCk (via their embed URLs).
Videos remain responsive (maintain aspect ratio) and are visible on mobile and desktop widths.

file_operations.description: Verify both iframes use correct embed URLs with the same video IDs (19kU6cAwXXk and DnTsf91_UCk), remain responsive via the existing aspect-ratio container, and have non-blocking iframe attributes; adjust iframe attributes/classes only if needed to fix rendering/playback.
